title: XRP Takes Center Stage Across Sentiment Charts ‚Äî Japan Lets Major Firms Join the XRP Club
body: XRP Tops Market Sentiment Charts as Investor Optimism Surges According to market analyst X Finance Bull, XRP has taken the lead in the latest market sentiment rankings, recording an impressive 255.29K score. The surge places XRP ahead of SEI and Zama, which followed closely with 244.58K and 243.03K, respectively, signaling renewed investor confidence in Ripple‚Äôs native token amid increasing institutional interest and blockchain adoption. Notably, this bullish shift stems from clearer regulatory standing for Ripple, the strong performance of its RLUSD stablecoin, and surging activity on the XRP Ledger (XRPL). Investor sentiment, gauged through social volume, engagement, and market positioning, offers a snapshot of collective confidence and price momentum. XRP‚Äôs lead on the sentiment charts signals not only strong retail enthusiasm but also rising institutional interest in digital assets with real-world utility. Therefore, XRP‚Äôs sentiment surge signals growing market recognition of its resilience and expanding ecosystem. Unlike hype-driven rallies, this rise reflects real adoption and utility. Meanwhile, SEI and Zama‚Äôs strong standings reflect the broader diversification of investor interest within the crypto market. SEI, known for its high-speed layer-1 architecture, continues to gain traction among DeFi developers. Zama, on the other hand, has seen a rise in attention due to its innovations in homomorphic encryption, signaling that blockchain investors are increasingly valuing technology-driven narratives. If the sentiment trend holds, XRP could be on the verge of a stronger market breakout, positioning it as one of the standout performers in the next phase of the crypto cycle. Japan Approves Eight Non-Financial Companies to Hold XRP According to Japanese market commentator Yuto, Japan has approved eight non-financial companies to include XRP among their cryptocurrency holdings, signaling another milestone in the nation‚Äôs progressive approach to digital assets. While the timing of when each company will begin holding XRP remains at their discretion, the approval itself underscores Japan‚Äôs growing confidence in Ripple‚Äôs technology and the broader digital asset economy. This move comes at a time when institutional adoption of cryptocurrencies is accelerating globally. Japan has long stood out as one of the most crypto-friendly nations, with clear regulatory frameworks that encourage responsible innovation. The Financial Services Agency (FSA), Japan‚Äôs primary financial regulator, has consistently taken a proactive stance in defining digital asset classifications and establishing guidelines for their use by corporations and investors alike. By approving non-financial companies in sectors like tech, retail, and manufacturing to hold XRP, Japan is accelerating mainstream crypto adoption beyond the financial sphere. This move expands XRP‚Äôs real-world utility across cross-border payments, treasury operations, and tokenized asset systems, while underscoring Ripple‚Äôs growing credibility and enterprise relevance in one of the world‚Äôs most tightly regulated markets. Analysts predict Japan‚Äôs move could spark a ripple effect across Asia‚Äôs corporate sector. As more businesses adopt digital assets, XRP‚Äôs deep integration within Japan‚Äôs financial ecosystem, strengthened by Ripple‚Äôs long-standing partnership with SBI Holdings, positions it for accelerated real-world adoption. With SBI already leveraging XRP for cross-border payments, its acceptance among non-financial firms could further cement the token‚Äôs role in mainstream finance. Although each of the eight firms will time their XRP entry based on internal strategies and market conditions, the collective approval underscores rising institutional confidence in XRP‚Äôs long-term value. The move boosts Ripple‚Äôs presence in Japan‚Äôs dynamic crypto market and reinforces XRP‚Äôs role as a trusted bridge between traditional finance and blockchain innovation. Conclusion XRP‚Äôs dominance in market sentiment highlights a strong revival of investor confidence and network relevance. Backed by a growing ecosystem, institutional adoption, and favorable regulatory progress, XRP is reclaiming its role as a leader in utility-driven blockchain innovation. While short-term volatility remains, the prevailing optimism reflects genuine faith in its long-term potential. As sentiment builds and adoption accelerates, XRP may be positioning itself for the next major breakout in the evolving crypto landscape. Meanwhile, Japan‚Äôs greenlight for eight non-financial firms to hold XRP marks a milestone in corporate crypto adoption. It underscores regulatory maturity and growing confidence in Ripple as a bridge between traditional finance and digital innovation, potentially sparking wider institutional adoption across Asia and beyond.

title: FTX withdraws proposal to forfeit $800M in customer claims
body: FTX has dropped its controversial plan to classify nearly $800 million in customer claims across 49 countries as ‚Äúrestricted‚Äù and potentially subject to forfeiture, marking a major victory for international creditors of the collapsed crypto exchange. The FTX Recovery Trust filed a formal notice of withdrawal with the Delaware bankruptcy court, reversing a proposal that had sparked strong opposition from creditor groups, particularly in China, which accounted for the majority of the affected claims. FTX changes its plan for bankruptcy after pressure from international creditors FTX initially requested a U.S. court to approve a ‚ÄúRestricted Jurisdiction Procedure‚Äù to determine the countries where local laws and government restrictions make it difficult to compensate users . The company aimed to simplify the repayment process, but instead, customers became angry when they discovered they would lose everything simply because of their location. The plan was to hire lawyers in each of the 49 countries to check if the repayment process was legal. Users in these regions would automatically lose their repayment right if the lawyer found out that the process broke local laws, and their money would be distributed among other creditors. International customers said the plan was unfair and discriminatory because users had already suffered big losses and should not be punished further just because of legal or political issues in their countries. Weiwei Ji, an investor based in Singapore, led 300 Chinese claimants and filed an official objection in a Delaware bankruptcy court. He said FTX had no solid reason to include China in the list of restricted countries and that if the court approved the plan, other big companies would start denying customers payments simply based on geography. FTX withdrew the motion after facing a lot of backlash, and many creditors are happy because customers will now get the money they deserve. Creditors welcome the reversal of bankruptcy as FTX focuses on repayment and appeal Many customers were pleased and said it felt like FTX was finally addressing their concerns. It also showed that the company wants to reduce new legal fights because if their plea was approved, customers would rise up again to fight it in court. Similarly, many creditors said they felt left out because most of the discussions and court actions took place in the United States, but after FTX reversed its plan, they now feel included. They also hope this step will speed up future decisions about how much money they can collect from the remaining assets. The founder of FTX, Sam Bankman-Fried, will attend his appeal hearing in New York to challenge his conviction for fraud. He continues to defend himself and says FTX and its trading firm, Alameda Research, were not insolvent when the company collapsed in 2022. The founder explains that his company had more than enough assets to survive the crisis, but bankruptcy lawyers exaggerated its financial problems and shut down the firm too quickly. The lawyers also sold valuable assets for far less than they were worth, and this made the situation that FTX was in look worse than it really was. Some of Bankman-Fried‚Äôs supporters say poor management was the reason the company collapsed in the first place, but legal experts and former employees disagree. They say billions of dollars in customer funds went missing, and records showed large amounts of money had been transferred to Alameda. Get up to $30,050 in trading rewards when you join Bybit today

title: Urgent TonStrategy Nasdaq Warning: Understanding TONX‚Äôs Rule Breach
body: BitcoinWorld Urgent TonStrategy Nasdaq Warning: Understanding TONX‚Äôs Rule Breach The cryptocurrency world often buzzes with exciting developments, but sometimes, it faces significant challenges. A recent headline has sent ripples through the market: TonStrategy (TONX) , a prominent strategic investor in The Open Network (TON), has received a serious TonStrategy Nasdaq warning . This isn‚Äôt just a minor procedural note; it highlights a critical violation of shareholder approval requirements, as reported by WalterBloomberg. What Triggered the Urgent TonStrategy Nasdaq Warning? This concerning development stems from a specific series of events that unfolded last August. TonStrategy engaged in a private placement and an asset purchase agreement. While such financial maneuvers are common in the corporate world, they must adhere strictly to the rules set by regulatory bodies like Nasdaq. The Core Issue: The private placement and asset purchase agreement failed to secure the necessary shareholder approval. Nasdaq‚Äôs Stance: Nasdaq listing rules are designed to protect investors by ensuring transparency and proper corporate governance. Shareholder approval for significant transactions is a cornerstone of these protections. The warning letter from Nasdaq is a formal notification that TonStrategy has fallen short of these vital listing requirements. This is a serious matter for any publicly traded company, especially one with significant ties to a growing blockchain ecosystem like TON. Why Does Nasdaq‚Äôs Rule Violation Matter for TONX? A TonStrategy Nasdaq warning carries considerable weight. Nasdaq is one of the world‚Äôs largest and most respected stock exchanges, known for its stringent listing standards. When a company violates these rules, it signals potential issues with corporate governance and investor protection. For TONX, this means several things: Reputational Damage: A public warning can erode investor confidence, potentially impacting the company‚Äôs stock performance. Compliance Scrutiny: Nasdaq will closely monitor TonStrategy‚Äôs actions moving forward, demanding rectifications. Market Perception: Investors, both current and prospective, will likely view TONX with increased caution until the matter is resolved. Moreover, as a strategic investor in The Open Network, TonStrategy‚Äôs challenges could indirectly influence sentiment around TON itself, although the direct impact on TON‚Äôs underlying technology and development remains separate. Understanding Nasdaq‚Äôs Shareholder Approval Requirements Nasdaq‚Äôs rules, specifically those related to shareholder approval, are not arbitrary. They exist to prevent corporate actions that might dilute existing shareholders‚Äô interests or involve significant asset transfers without their consent. For instance, Nasdaq Rule 5635(d) often requires shareholder approval for certain equity issuances that exceed 20% of outstanding shares or voting power, especially in private placements. In this case, TonStrategy‚Äôs August transactions likely triggered such a requirement, which they evidently failed to meet. This oversight raises questions about internal compliance procedures and governance frameworks within the company. What Are TonStrategy‚Äôs Next Steps After the Warning? Receiving a TonStrategy Nasdaq warning is not an immediate delisting notice, but it is a precursor to potential enforcement actions if the issue is not addressed promptly. Typically, TonStrategy will be required to submit a plan to regain compliance within a specified timeframe, often 60 days. This plan would likely involve: Remedial Actions: Taking steps to rectify the specific violation, which could involve seeking retroactive shareholder approval or unwinding parts of the transaction if feasible. Improved Governance: Demonstrating to Nasdaq that internal controls have been strengthened to prevent future breaches. Communication: Transparently communicating with shareholders and the market about the steps being taken. Failure to adequately address the warning could lead to more severe consequences, including delisting proceedings, which would be a significant blow to TonStrategy and its investors. Implications for Investors in TONX and The Open Network For investors holding TONX shares, this TonStrategy Nasdaq warning necessitates careful consideration. It‚Äôs crucial to monitor the company‚Äôs official statements regarding its plan to resolve the compliance issue. The market‚Äôs reaction will also provide insights into how seriously this event is perceived. For those invested in The Open Network (TON), while TonStrategy is an important strategic partner, TON‚Äôs decentralized nature means it‚Äôs not directly reliant on any single entity. However, the reputational spillover from a key investor facing regulatory issues is always a possibility. Investors should focus on TON‚Äôs core development, ecosystem growth, and overall market sentiment rather than solely on investor-specific news. Conclusion: Navigating the TonStrategy Nasdaq Warning The TonStrategy Nasdaq warning is a stark reminder of the importance of corporate governance and regulatory compliance, even in the fast-paced world of crypto-related investments. While TonStrategy has a path to rectify this situation, the incident underscores the need for due diligence from companies and vigilance from investors. How TonStrategy responds will be critical in restoring confidence and ensuring its continued presence on a major exchange. This event serves as a valuable lesson: adherence to established rules is paramount for maintaining market integrity and investor trust. The coming weeks will reveal TonStrategy‚Äôs strategy to navigate this challenging period. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What exactly is the TonStrategy Nasdaq warning about? A1: The warning is for violating Nasdaq‚Äôs shareholder approval requirements, specifically concerning a private placement and asset purchase agreement made in August. These transactions did not receive the necessary approval from shareholders as mandated by Nasdaq‚Äôs listing rules. Q2: Is TonStrategy (TONX) going to be delisted immediately? A2: No, a warning letter is not an immediate delisting. It typically initiates a process where TonStrategy must submit a plan to regain compliance within a set timeframe, usually 60 days. Delisting is a potential consequence if the company fails to address the violation adequately. Q3: How does this TonStrategy Nasdaq warning affect The Open Network (TON)? A3: TonStrategy is a strategic investor in TON, so while the warning doesn‚Äôt directly impact TON‚Äôs technology or operations, it could indirectly affect investor sentiment towards the TON ecosystem due to reputational spillover from a key partner. However, TON‚Äôs decentralized nature provides some insulation. Q4: What are the potential consequences for TonStrategy if they don‚Äôt resolve the issue? A4: Failure to address the violation and regain compliance could lead to more severe enforcement actions from Nasdaq, including the potential delisting of TONX shares from the exchange. This would significantly impact the company‚Äôs access to capital and its public profile. Q5: What should investors in TONX do now? A5: Investors should closely monitor TonStrategy‚Äôs official announcements regarding their plan to resolve the compliance issue. It‚Äôs advisable to assess the company‚Äôs response, the market‚Äôs reaction, and consider how this situation aligns with your investment strategy and risk tolerance. Share this crucial update with your network! Stay informed about the latest developments in the crypto investment landscape by sharing this article on your social media platforms. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping blockchain innovation price action. title: Ripple (XRP) Expands Corporate Payments Business: New Acquisition Agreement Announced! "Solana and Ethereum Details Also Included!"
body: Partnership news continues to come from Ripple, which won a major victory in its legal battle with the SEC. Ripple said it will expand its enterprise custody and payments business with the acquisition of Palisade. Ripple Doesn't Stop! Continuing its corporate expansion, Ripple has acquired cryptocurrency wallet and custody company Palisade as part of its efforts to expand its corporate payments business. The combination of Ripple's bank-grade vault and Palisade's fast and lightweight wallet makes Ripple Custody the end-to-end provider for every institutional need, from long-term storage to real-time global payments and treasury management.‚Äù Ripple also added that it has made numerous acquisitions this year, including Hidden Road for $1.25 billion and stablecoin platform Rail for $200 million. To this point, Ripple said in the statement that it has ‚Äúinvested approximately $4 billion in the crypto ecosystem‚Äù through investments, mergers, and acquisitions. Last month, Ripple acquired GTreasury for $1 billion, aiming to unlock the multitrillion-dollar corporate treasury market and gain access to the largest and most successful institutional clients. Ripple also recently noted that Palisade has deep integrations with XRP, Solana (SOL), and Ethereum (ETH). *This is not investment advice. title: Crypto Bull Market: Arthur Hayes Reveals Looming Stealth QE Catalyst
body: BitcoinWorld Crypto Bull Market: Arthur Hayes Reveals Looming Stealth QE Catalyst Are you ready for the next massive surge in digital assets? BitMEX founder Arthur Hayes has a compelling prediction that could reshape your understanding of the financial landscape and potentially ignite a new crypto bull market . His latest insights suggest the U.S. is quietly preparing a financial maneuver with significant implications for cryptocurrencies. What‚Äôs Fueling Hayes‚Äô Bold Crypto Bull Market Prediction? Arthur Hayes, known for his sharp macroeconomic analysis, recently shared his views on his blog. He believes the U.S. Treasury and the Federal Reserve are setting the stage for what he terms ‚Äústealth quantitative easing‚Äù (QE). This isn‚Äôt your typical, publicly announced QE, but a more subtle approach designed to inject liquidity into the system. Hayes‚Äô argument begins with the U.S. government‚Äôs preferred method of funding its substantial spending: issuing bonds. Rather than increasing taxes, the Treasury relies on selling debt. However, a critical problem is emerging: demand for this U.S. debt is softening. Weakening Foreign Demand: Foreign central banks are increasingly diversifying their reserves, often by accumulating gold. This shift signals a growing apprehension about the risks associated with dollar-denominated assets. Sluggish Private Sector Interest: Domestically, private sector demand for U.S. Treasurys also remains unenthusiastic. Hayes points out that even the four largest commercial banks have only absorbed a fraction of the recently issued debt. This weakening demand creates a significant challenge, especially when considering the sheer volume of new debt. The Treasury is projected to issue an astonishing $2 trillion in new bonds annually just to cover the existing fiscal deficit. How Could ‚ÄúStealth QE‚Äù Spark a Robust Crypto Bull Market ? In this challenging environment of high debt issuance and dwindling demand, Hayes foresees a crucial intervention. If the market‚Äôs liquidity proves insufficient to absorb the massive influx of new bonds, the Federal Reserve will likely step in. How? Through its Standing Repo Facility (SRF). The SRF allows eligible financial institutions to temporarily exchange U.S. Treasury securities for cash from the Fed. While technically different from traditional QE, Hayes argues that the effect is remarkably similar. It effectively injects funds into the market, increasing the money supply and easing financial conditions. Think of it this way: When the Fed uses the SRF to provide liquidity, it‚Äôs essentially ensuring there‚Äôs enough cash flowing through the system to buy the government‚Äôs debt. This indirect method of monetary expansion, according to Hayes, acts like a hidden form of QE. Historically, periods of increased monetary supply and quantitative easing have often correlated with upward movements in risk assets, including cryptocurrencies. The expectation is that this new wave of liquidity will find its way into various markets, potentially reigniting a robust crypto bull market . What Are the Actionable Insights for Investors in a Potential Crypto Bull Market ? Hayes‚Äô analysis isn‚Äôt just a prediction; it comes with a clear recommendation for investors. He advises accumulating cash in anticipation of this ‚Äústealth QE‚Äù scenario materializing. His rationale is straightforward: Strategic Positioning: Holding cash allows investors to be ready to deploy capital when the market signals a clear shift. Rapid Rebound: Once the Fed begins injecting funds, Hayes expects the market, especially the crypto sector, to rebound both quickly and strongly. This suggests a potential for significant gains for those positioned correctly. This strategy highlights the importance of understanding the broader macroeconomic forces at play. While the U.S. government faces a dilemma in funding its spending, the proposed solution could inadvertently create a powerful tailwind for digital assets. Investors who pay close attention to these underlying economic shifts may find themselves well-prepared for the next surge. Is a New Crypto Bull Market on the Horizon? Arthur Hayes‚Äô perspective offers a fascinating look into the intricate dance between government spending, bond markets, and central bank policy. His prediction of ‚Äústealth QE‚Äù presents a compelling narrative for how a new crypto bull market could emerge from the current economic landscape. While the mechanisms are complex, the potential outcome for crypto investors is clear: a significant injection of liquidity could provide the necessary catalyst. Staying informed about these macroeconomic developments is crucial for navigating the volatile yet opportunity-rich world of cryptocurrencies. As Hayes suggests, the market might just be waiting for its hidden boost. Frequently Asked Questions About the Crypto Bull Market and Stealth QE Q1: What is ‚Äústealth QE‚Äù according to Arthur Hayes? A1: ‚ÄúStealth QE‚Äù refers to the U.S. Federal Reserve injecting liquidity into the financial system through its Standing Repo Facility (SRF). Hayes believes this action, while not traditional quantitative easing, will have a similar effect by increasing the money supply to help absorb government debt. Q2: Why does Arthur Hayes believe the U.S. will resort to stealth QE? A2: Hayes argues that the U.S. government needs to issue $2 trillion in new bonds annually to cover its deficit, but demand from both foreign central banks and the private sector for these bonds is weakening. If there isn‚Äôt enough liquidity to buy this debt, the Fed will step in via the SRF. Q3: How could stealth QE impact the crypto market? A3: Historically, periods of increased monetary supply and quantitative easing have led to capital flowing into risk assets, including cryptocurrencies. Hayes predicts that this new wave of liquidity will reignite a strong crypto bull market . Q4: What is Arthur Hayes‚Äô advice for investors based on this prediction? A4: Hayes advises accumulating cash in anticipation of the stealth QE scenario. He believes that once the Fed begins injecting funds, the crypto market will rebound quickly and strongly, rewarding those who are strategically positioned. Q5: Is the Standing Repo Facility (SRF) the same as traditional Quantitative Easing (QE)? A5: While the SRF is a different tool used for short-term liquidity management, Hayes argues that its effect of injecting funds into the market to facilitate bond purchases is functionally similar to traditional QE in terms of increasing the money supply. If you found this analysis insightful, consider sharing it with your network! Understanding these complex financial dynamics is key to making informed decisions in the fast-paced world of crypto. Spread the word and help others grasp the potential catalysts for the next big move. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action. This post Crypto Bull Market: Arthur Hayes Reveals Looming Stealth QE Catalyst first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: ZEC extends rally even as BTC price slips
body: ZCash (ZEC) looks like the sole survivor of the crypto market. The coin expanded close to $480, as its climb is not affected by the overall market fear. ZCash (ZEC) once again moves against all market logic, returning to the $480 range. The coin rallied despite the dip of BTC to $105,000, moving on its own market logic. Bridged ZEC on Solana briefly broke above $500, boosted by general hype and a whale-sized order. | Source: CoinGecko . ZEC relies on active derivative trading, with open interest rising to over $582M. However, spot buying and accumulation is also happening, with a few hundred coins each day added to shielded pools. ZCash mining is also at an all-time high, with the hashrate reaching a record . At the current stage, the ZCash community is showing true belief, but there are still skeptics who see the ZEC rally as an attempt at finding exit liquidity. ZEC rises on Solana-based activity The two main sources of ZEC activity are derivative trades, and DEX trading on Solana . ZEC has become a DeFi token, though at much smaller volumes. However, this is also one of the main sources for making whale-sized orders and swaying the price. ZEC on Omni Bridge has a supply of 28,280 coins, with a total valuation above $13M. Recently, a whale made a $300K order , buying ZEC at $600, breaking above all other platforms. Previously, whale buyers have also boosted ZEC. Solana has now become the main decentralized venue for trading ZEC , with volumes recently posting a record. However, the DEX market remains much smaller compared to other listings for ZEC. On Solana, the ZEC narrative has replaced the meme token hype, after the trenches slowed down. Now, ZEC is seen as a potential source of liquidity and interest in DEX trading. The coin has returned to levels not seen since 2017, but has also received additional attention after years of inactivity. ZEC mindshare is up by another 574% since October 5, rising to 0.7%. The coin sees a mix of retail hype and whale activity. Recently, a whale opened a 5X long position on Solana, after depositing $7.9M USDC. ZEC still gets aggressively shorted The current rally comes with over 62% in short positions on most major exchanges. On Hyperliquid, more whales are going long, with just 43% in short positions, betting on continued ZEC expansion. Based on short liquidity positions, ZEC may try to liquidate traders up to $495. However, there is liquidity on the downside, and ZEC has also shown it can dip to a lower range. ZEC is now the top privacy coin by market capitalization, even after taking a step back to $462. The token flipped Litecoin (LTC), and moved faster compared to other legacy private coins. Monero (XMR) remains active, though its expansion stalled at $344. Decred (DCR) and DASH also achieved near-vertical rallies, but are still incapable of catching up with ZEC. The privacy narrative is also not the main driver of the ZEC rally, which is getting a boost from influencers and whale traders. title: Bitcoin & Ethereum Treasuries Surge: Strategy, BitMine Reveal Fresh Buys
body: Bitcoin and Ethereum corporate treasuries have seen fresh growth this week as both Strategy and BitMine have announced new acquisitions. Strategy & BitMine Have Both Added To Their Treasury Reserves Strategy and BitMine , the largest Bitcoin and Ethereum treasury companies, respectively, have just revealed new purchases. The former‚Äôs announcement comes through a routine Monday X post from co-founder and chairman Michael Saylor. With this purchase, the company has added 397 BTC to its holdings. The buy, which occurred in the period between October 27th and November 2nd, cost Strategy about $114,771 per token, or a total of $45.6 million. This acquisition isn‚Äôt too big and continues the recent trend of small, but consistent purchases from the Bitcoin hoarder. According to the filing with the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), the firm‚Äôs acquisition has come alongside sales of its STRF, STRK, STRD, and MSTR at-the-market (ATM) stock offerings. While Strategy‚Äôs purchase has been relatively modest, BitMine has made a more substantial acquisition. As announced in a press release, the Ethereum treasury company expanded its holdings by 82,353 ETH during the past week, worth about $302 million at the current exchange rate. BitMine now owns 3.4 million ETH, equivalent to 2.8% of the cryptocurrency‚Äôs entire circulating supply. ‚ÄúWe are now more than halfway towards our initial pursuit of the ‚Äòalchemy of 5%‚Äô of ETH,‚Äù noted Thomas ‚ÄúTom‚Äù Lee of Fundstrat, Chairman of BitMine. BitMine is the largest ETH treasury in the world, but in terms of overall cryptocurrency corporate holders, the firm comes second behind Strategy. Saylor‚Äôs firm holds 641,205 BTC after the latest purchase, equivalent to over 3.2% of the Bitcoin supply. Strategy invested a total of $47.49 billion into these holdings, and today, the tokens value at $68.8 billion, giving the firm a healthy profit margin. While the Bitcoin treasury is in the green, BitMine‚Äôs ETH reserves are underwater. The company spent $13.25 billion to assemble its Ethereum stack, but at current prices, the reserve values at $12.43 billion. Both BTC and ETH have gone through bearish price action recently, but the reason Strategy‚Äôs holdings are still strong lies in the fact that the firm has been at its buying spree for years now, while BitMine is a new player in the space, so its cost basis is much closer to recent prices. While Strategy and BitMine have continued to accumulate recently, the wider trend in the sector is that institutional buying pressure has been slowing down. As Capriole Investments founder Charles Edwards has explained in an X post , net institutional accumulation has dropped below the daily miner issuance . This is the first time in seven months that this trend has developed, suggesting a shift in institutional interest in Bitcoin. BTC Price At the time of writing, Bitcoin is floating around $107,300, down 7% over the last seven days.

title: XRP Documented for Major Asset Recommended for IMF By ECB President
body: Crypto researcher SMQKE has shared documents suggesting that private sectors could issue a new Special Drawing Rights (SDR)-based digital currency on a Layer 1 blockchain such as the XRP Ledger. The material outlines how a blockchain-based version of the SDR could combine the IMF‚Äôs backing and the existing fiat basket model with the transparency and efficiency of distributed ledger technology. The documents describe the proposal as a way to modernize the SDR framework, making it compatible with blockchain ecosystems while maintaining its reserve-backed stability. Unlike traditional IMF SDRs, which are allocated to member states, this proposed ‚Äúcrypto SDR‚Äù would be privately issued and freely circulated, creating a new bridge between traditional finance and digital assets. THE NEW SDR-BASED CRYPTO CAN BE ISSUED BY THE PRIVATE SECTOR ON A LAYER 1 BLOCKCHAIN SUCH AS THE XRP LEDGER Documented. https://t.co/2h6COUUxMD pic.twitter.com/pCMgritUap ‚Äî SMQKE (@SMQKEDQG) November 2, 2025 Design and technological framework The documents outline two models for possible implementation. The first involves developing a new blockchain to host the SDR token, defined as a Layer 1 approach. The second, described as more practical, involves issuing the asset on an existing blockchain such as the XRP Ledger , a Layer 1 network designed for efficient cross-border transactions. The material notes that both options require strong compliance mechanisms and stable collateralization to preserve the SDR‚Äôs intended function as a low-volatility reserve asset. The eSDR framework would use blockchain to streamline international settlements. By pegging its value to the SDR‚Äôs existing basket of major currencies, the digital asset would provide a stable valuation mechanism while removing reliance on intermediaries. The report suggests that the private sector‚Äôs adoption of a Layer 1 blockchain would allow faster deployment, real-time settlement, and enhanced data transparency across jurisdictions. Application in cross-border payments The documentation further explores how central banks or private issuers could use eSDRs to facilitate cross-border transactions. It outlines a model in which payments move directly from one currency into the eSDR and then into another, achieving near-instant settlement without traditional correspondent banking layers. The proposed framework would also reduce foreign exchange costs and improve liquidity for banks, financial institutions, and potentially fintech platforms integrated with the ledger. The attached material references the XRP Ledger‚Äôs design as a foundation for this kind of programmable payment solution. It highlights its high throughput, low transaction cost, and compliance adaptability as characteristics that could make it suitable for issuing an SDR-pegged instrument. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 Institutional Impact If implemented, an SDR-linked crypto asset could serve as a hybrid model between central bank digital currencies and stablecoins, combining regulatory oversight with decentralized technology. However, the documentation acknowledges key challenges, including jurisdictional regulations, interoperability with existing systems, and the need for clear reserve management frameworks. According to the research shared by SMQKE, private-sector issuance of an SDR-pegged digital asset on a Layer 1 blockchain could represent a major step toward a unified, blockchain-based reserve instrument. The model positions the XRP Ledger as a potential foundation for such development, aligning with ongoing efforts to enhance transparency and efficiency in the global payments ecosystem. title: Crucial Update: OKX Announces Delisting of AI16Z Perpetual Futures
body: BitcoinWorld Crucial Update: OKX Announces Delisting of AI16Z Perpetual Futures An urgent announcement has just been released by OKX, signaling a significant shift for traders involved in specific derivative markets. The exchange has confirmed the imminent delisting of the AI16Z perpetual futures contract, a development that demands immediate attention from anyone holding or considering positions. This crucial decision by OKX is set to take effect on November 6, 2023, at 8:00 a.m. UTC, and understanding its implications is essential for safeguarding your trading strategy and assets. What Does the Delisting of AI16Z Perpetual Futures Mean for Traders? OKX has officially scheduled the delisting of the AI16Z perpetual futures contract. This means that after the specified time on November 6, traders will no longer be able to open new positions or maintain existing ones on this particular contract. For many, this news prompts questions about the underlying reasons and the necessary steps to take. A perpetual futures contract, for those new to the concept, is a type of derivative that allows traders to speculate on the future price of an asset without an expiry date, unlike traditional futures. The AI16Z perpetual futures contract enabled users to trade the AI16Z token against USDT, offering leverage and opportunities for both long and short positions. Exchanges typically delist contracts due to various factors. These can include low liquidity, insufficient trading volume, concerns about the underlying asset‚Äôs project viability, or even regulatory considerations. While OKX has not provided explicit detailed reasons for the AI16Z perpetual futures delisting in their initial announcement, traders should always be prepared for such possibilities in the dynamic crypto market. How Should Traders Prepare for the AI16Z Perpetual Futures Delisting? For traders currently holding positions in the AI16Z perpetual futures contract, immediate action is paramount. Procrastination can lead to unfavorable outcomes, including forced liquidation at potentially disadvantageous prices. It is vital to manage your positions proactively before the delisting deadline. Here are the essential steps you should consider taking: Close Open Positions: If you have any active long or short positions on the AI16Z perpetual futures , it is strongly advised to close them before the delisting time. This allows you to control your exit price and avoid automatic settlements by the exchange. Monitor Your Portfolio: Keep a close watch on your OKX account to ensure all positions related to AI16Z are managed appropriately. Withdraw or Convert Assets: After closing positions, consider withdrawing any remaining USDT or converting it to other assets if you do not plan to use it for other trades on OKX. Acting swiftly ensures you retain control over your funds and mitigate potential risks associated with the automatic settlement process. What Are the Broader Implications of Such Delistings? The delisting of an asset like the AI16Z perpetual futures contract serves as a critical reminder of the inherent volatility and evolving nature of the cryptocurrency market. Such events highlight the importance of continuous vigilance and robust risk management strategies for all traders, regardless of their experience level. It underscores the need to: Stay Informed: Regularly check official announcements from exchanges where you trade. Diversify Your Portfolio: Avoid over-reliance on a single asset or contract. Understand Underlying Assets: Research the projects behind the tokens you trade to assess their long-term viability. While the delisting of AI16Z perpetual futures might seem like an isolated event, it is part of a broader trend where exchanges continually review and optimize their offerings based on market conditions and regulatory landscapes. Adapting to these changes is a key skill for success in crypto trading. In conclusion, the upcoming delisting of the AI16Z perpetual futures contract by OKX on November 6, 2023, is a significant event for affected traders. By understanding the announcement, taking prompt action to manage existing positions, and reflecting on broader market strategies, traders can navigate this change effectively. Always prioritize proactive risk management and stay informed about exchange policies to protect your investments in the fast-paced world of cryptocurrency. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What exactly happens at 8:00 a.m. UTC on November 6? A1: At this time, OKX will cease all trading activities for the AI16Z perpetual futures contract. Any open positions will be automatically settled by the exchange based on the last available market price, which might not be ideal for traders. Q2: Why did OKX decide to delist the AI16Z perpetual futures? A2: While OKX has not provided specific reasons, delistings often occur due to factors such as low trading volume, insufficient liquidity, or concerns about the underlying project‚Äôs long-term viability or regulatory compliance. Q3: Will I lose all my funds if I don‚Äôt close my AI16Z perpetual futures position? A3: You will not necessarily lose all your funds, but your positions will be automatically closed by the exchange. This automatic settlement might occur at a less favorable price than if you had closed the position manually, potentially leading to losses or reduced profits. Q4: Can I still trade the AI16Z spot token on OKX? A4: The delisting specifically applies to the AI16Z perpetual futures contract. Traders should check OKX‚Äôs official announcements regarding the spot trading pair for AI16Z/USDT to confirm its status. Q5: How can I stay updated on future delistings or important announcements from OKX? A5: It is highly recommended to regularly check the official OKX announcement page, their social media channels, and subscribe to their official newsletters for timely updates on all trading activities and policy changes. Q6: What is a perpetual futures contract in simple terms? A6: A perpetual futures contract is a type of derivative that allows you to speculate on the price movement of an asset, like AI16Z, without actually owning the asset and without an expiry date. It is often used for leveraged trading. We hope this article helps you navigate the recent announcement from OKX. Your proactive engagement is key to successful crypto trading. Share this article with fellow traders to ensure everyone is informed about the AI16Z perpetual futures delisting! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping cryptocurrency price action. This post Crucial Update: OKX Announces Delisting of AI16Z Perpetual Futures first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: FTX Creditors Repayment: A Triumphant Breakthrough for 49 Nations
body: BitcoinWorld FTX Creditors Repayment: A Triumphant Breakthrough for 49 Nations For thousands of individuals and entities impacted by the collapse of the FTX cryptocurrency exchange, a significant ray of hope has emerged. The path to FTX creditors repayment has just become clearer and more accessible for many around the globe. This pivotal development signals a major step towards resolution in one of crypto‚Äôs most high-profile bankruptcies. A Major Step Forward for FTX Creditors Repayment In a move that will undoubtedly bring relief to countless affected parties, the FTX Recovery Trust has officially withdrawn its controversial plan to restrict repayments to creditors located in 49 specific countries. This decision directly impacts nations like China, Russia, Saudi Arabia, and Ukraine, which were previously on a list for potential exclusion from the initial repayment processes. The exact reason for this withdrawal remains undisclosed, but its impact is undeniably positive for the global community of FTX creditors repayment . Previously, the trust had sought court approval to halt payments to these creditors, creating significant uncertainty and anxiety. This reversal opens up the possibility for a more unified and equitable distribution process, ensuring that geographical location does not unfairly impede the recovery of funds. What Does This Mean for Global FTX Creditors? The withdrawal of the restriction plan has profound implications for a vast number of individuals and institutions. Firstly, it broadens the scope of eligible claimants, bringing relief to those who feared being left out. Secondly, it simplifies the administrative burden for the FTX Recovery Trust itself, as they no longer need to navigate complex legal and logistical hurdles associated with excluding creditors from specific jurisdictions. This streamlined approach could potentially accelerate the overall timeline for FTX creditors repayment . Here are some key benefits: Wider Access: Creditors in the 49 previously restricted countries now have a clear path to claim their funds. Reduced Uncertainty: The decision removes a significant layer of legal and financial ambiguity for a large segment of the creditor base. Potentially Faster Process: A more unified approach can help expedite the distribution of assets, avoiding prolonged legal battles over geographical restrictions. Increased Equity: The move promotes a more equitable distribution, treating all creditors similarly regardless of their location. Navigating the Path to FTX Creditors Repayment: Next Steps While this development is a cause for optimism, creditors should remain vigilant and proactive. The FTX Recovery Trust is responsible for managing the assets of the bankrupt exchange and facilitating the distribution process. Therefore, staying informed through official channels and understanding the procedural requirements for claiming funds is crucial. Creditors should regularly check updates from the FTX Recovery Trust and their legal representatives. The journey to full FTX creditors repayment has been long and arduous, marked by numerous legal complexities and the sheer scale of the exchange‚Äôs collapse. However, each step towards clarity and broader inclusion brings the community closer to a final resolution. This recent decision is a testament to the ongoing efforts to restore faith and deliver justice to those affected by the FTX debacle. The Road Ahead: Ensuring a Smooth Repayment Process The withdrawal of the restriction plan is a significant hurdle cleared, but it‚Äôs important to remember that the overall repayment process still involves many stages. Creditors will need to follow specific instructions provided by the FTX Recovery Trust regarding claims submission, verification, and distribution methods. Transparency from the trust will be key to ensuring a smooth and efficient process for all. This positive turn of events underscores the dynamic nature of cryptocurrency bankruptcy proceedings. What might seem like an insurmountable challenge can, with persistent effort and legal adjustments, evolve into a more favorable outcome for affected parties. The global crypto community watches closely as the FTX Recovery Trust continues its work to finalize the FTX creditors repayment . Summary: The FTX Recovery Trust‚Äôs decision to withdraw restrictions on repayments for creditors in 49 countries marks a momentous occasion. It broadens access, reduces uncertainty, and streamlines the process for thousands of individuals and entities worldwide. This breakthrough offers renewed hope for a more equitable and efficient resolution to the FTX bankruptcy, bringing the global community of FTX creditors repayment closer to recovering their assets. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: Which countries were initially restricted from FTX repayments? A1: The FTX Recovery Trust had initially sought to restrict repayments to creditors in 49 countries, including prominent nations such as China, Russia, Saudi Arabia, and Ukraine. Q2: Why was the plan to restrict repayments withdrawn? A2: The exact reason for the withdrawal was not officially disclosed by the FTX Recovery Trust. However, it is widely believed to be a move towards a more equitable and less complex global distribution process. Q3: What should FTX creditors in these countries do now? A3: Creditors should stay informed by regularly checking official updates from the FTX Recovery Trust and their legal representatives. They should prepare to follow the standard claims submission and verification procedures as outlined by the trust. Q4: Does this decision guarantee full repayment for all FTX creditors? A4: While this decision significantly broadens access to the repayment process, it does not guarantee full repayment. The total amount recovered will depend on the value of the assets managed by the FTX Recovery Trust and the total approved claims. Q5: When can creditors expect to receive their funds? A5: The timeline for repayments in bankruptcy cases can be complex and lengthy. While this decision streamlines the process, creditors should anticipate that the actual distribution of funds will still take time. Official updates from the FTX Recovery Trust will provide more specific timelines as they become available. If you found this update helpful, please share it with your network! Stay informed about the latest developments in the crypto space by following our channel on social media. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping cryptocurrency institutional adoption. This post FTX Creditors Repayment: A Triumphant Breakthrough for 49 Nations first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: US Dollar‚Äôs Resilient Reign: Navigating Global Currency Turbulence
body: BitcoinWorld US Dollar‚Äôs Resilient Reign: Navigating Global Currency Turbulence In the dynamic world of global finance, the stability of major fiat currencies often serves as a crucial barometer for overall market health. For those immersed in the cryptocurrency space, understanding these traditional market shifts is not just academic; it can directly influence digital asset valuations, investor sentiment, and capital flows. Recently, the US Dollar has showcased remarkable resilience, holding firm near its recent highs, while the British Sterling has faced considerable headwinds, primarily due to domestic political challenges. This divergence creates a fascinating landscape for analysis, revealing deeper insights into the forces shaping global finance. Why is the US Dollar Maintaining its Unwavering Strength? The US Dollar has long been considered the world‚Äôs primary reserve currency and a safe haven during times of uncertainty. Its current strength is not accidental but a culmination of several powerful factors. The Federal Reserve‚Äôs aggressive stance on interest rate hikes, aimed at curbing persistent inflation, has made dollar-denominated assets more attractive to international investors. Higher yields draw capital, strengthening the currency. Interest Rate Differentials: The Federal Reserve‚Äôs commitment to fighting inflation through rate increases has widened the gap between US interest rates and those in many other developed economies. This makes holding dollars more rewarding. Global Economic Uncertainty: In an era marked by geopolitical tensions, energy crises, and inflation fears, the dollar acts as a safe harbor. Investors flock to US assets, perceived as stable, when other markets become turbulent. Robust US Economic Data: Despite concerns, the US economy has shown relative resilience, particularly in its labor market. Strong employment figures and consumer spending can bolster confidence in the dollar‚Äôs underlying economic support. This sustained strength of the US Dollar has significant implications, not just for traditional markets but also for the cryptocurrency ecosystem, often impacting the price of Bitcoin and other digital assets, which are typically priced against the dollar. What Political Woes are Hitting the British Sterling So Hard? While the dollar enjoys its moment of strength, the British Sterling tells a different story. The UK economy has been grappling with a series of challenges, exacerbated by political instability. Frequent changes in leadership and policy direction have created an environment of uncertainty, which currency markets inherently dislike. Political Turmoil: The UK has seen significant political shifts, including leadership contests and policy reversals. Such instability erodes investor confidence, making the pound less appealing. High Inflation and Cost of Living Crisis: The UK is facing some of the highest inflation rates among G7 nations, severely impacting household incomes and consumer spending. This economic pressure puts the Bank of England in a difficult position, balancing inflation control with economic growth. Recession Risks: Many economists predict a recession for the UK economy. A shrinking economy typically weakens its currency as prospects for future growth diminish. Lingering Brexit Impact: While not a new issue, the long-term economic consequences of Brexit continue to weigh on trade relationships and labor availability, adding to the Sterling‚Äôs vulnerability. The combined effect of these factors has put immense pressure on the British Sterling , leading to its depreciation against major currencies, including the strong US Dollar. Understanding Forex Market Dynamics: What Drives Currency Volatility? The Forex market , or foreign exchange market, is the largest financial market globally, where currencies are traded. Its sheer scale and constant activity mean that understanding its dynamics is key to grasping broader economic trends. Currency values are not static; they are in constant flux, driven by a complex interplay of economic, political, and psychological factors. Here are some core drivers of Forex market movements: Interest Rates: As seen with the US Dollar, higher interest rates attract foreign capital seeking better returns, strengthening a currency. Economic Performance: A country with a strong, growing economy tends to have a stronger currency. Indicators like GDP growth, employment rates, and manufacturing data are closely watched. Political Stability: Stable political environments foster investor confidence, while instability, as experienced by the British Sterling , can lead to capital flight and currency depreciation. Trade Balances: A country that exports more than it imports (a trade surplus) will generally see its currency strengthen as foreigners buy more of its goods and thus its currency. Market Sentiment and Speculation: Trader expectations and large speculative positions can also significantly influence short-term currency movements. The contrasting performance of the US Dollar and British Sterling vividly illustrates these dynamics. One benefits from favorable interest rate differentials and safe-haven demand, while the other struggles with political uncertainty and economic headwinds. Factor US Dollar (USD) British Sterling (GBP) Interest Rates Higher Federal Reserve rates attracting capital, supporting value. Bank of England balancing inflation control with growth, creating uncertainty. Economic Growth Relatively robust, resilient labor market and consumer spending. Slowdown, high inflation, and significant recession risks. Political Stability Generally stable, predictable policy environment. Frequent leadership changes, policy uncertainty, impacting confidence. Safe-Haven Status Strong demand during global crises, seen as a reliable store of value. Limited safe-haven appeal, vulnerable to global risk-off sentiment. Inflation Outlook Fed actively tackling inflation, signs of potential moderation. Persistent high inflation, impacting real wages and consumer purchasing power. The Ripple Effect of Currency Volatility on Global Economics Currency volatility is more than just a concern for Forex traders; it has far-reaching implications for global economics. A strong US Dollar can make US exports more expensive, potentially dampening demand from other countries. Conversely, it makes imports cheaper for US consumers, which can help mitigate domestic inflation but also impact local industries. For countries with dollar-denominated debt, a strong dollar means a higher cost of repayment. For the UK, a weak British Sterling can make its exports cheaper and more competitive on the global market, potentially boosting trade. However, it also makes imports more expensive, contributing to inflationary pressures and increasing the cost of living for consumers and businesses reliant on imported goods, such as energy. This creates a difficult balancing act for policymakers and businesses alike. Impact on Trade: Currency fluctuations directly affect the cost of imports and exports, influencing trade balances and corporate profits. Inflationary Pressures: A depreciating currency makes imports more expensive, feeding into domestic inflation, while an appreciating currency can help curb it. Investment Flows: Currency stability and strength are key considerations for foreign direct investment. Volatility can deter investors. Central Bank Responses: Central banks like the Federal Reserve and the Bank of England are constantly monitoring currency movements, often adjusting monetary policy in response to maintain economic stability. Understanding these ripple effects is crucial for anyone looking to navigate the complex landscape of global economics . Actionable Insights for Traders: Adapting to Current Global Economics For those involved in the Forex market , the current environment presents both challenges and opportunities. Navigating a strong US Dollar and a weak British Sterling requires careful planning and a robust understanding of market drivers. Monitor Central Bank Communications: Pay close attention to statements from the Federal Reserve and the Bank of England. Their forward guidance on interest rates and economic outlooks are primary drivers of currency movements. Track Key Economic Data: GDP reports, inflation figures (CPI), employment data, and retail sales provide vital clues about economic health and potential currency direction. Diversify and Manage Risk: In times of currency volatility , diversification across different asset classes and careful risk management are paramount. Don‚Äôt over-leverage, and use stop-loss orders. Understand Geopolitical Risks: Global political events and conflicts can swiftly alter market sentiment and currency flows. Stay informed about major international developments. Consider Currency Pairs: Focus on pairs where the fundamental divergence is clear, such as USD/GBP, but also be aware of how other major currencies interact. These insights can help traders make informed decisions in a world shaped by evolving global economics and unpredictable political landscapes. FAQs: Your Questions on Dollar, Sterling, and Forex Answered What makes the US Dollar a safe haven? The US Dollar is considered a safe haven due to the size and liquidity of the US financial markets, the stability of the US government, and its role as the world‚Äôs primary reserve currency. During global crises, investors tend to move capital into US Treasury bonds and other dollar-denominated assets, driving up its value. How do political events impact the British Sterling? Political events, such as leadership changes, policy uncertainty, and referendums, directly affect investor confidence in a country‚Äôs economic future. Negative political developments can lead to capital outflow and a decrease in demand for the currency, causing the British Sterling to weaken. Institutions like the Bank of England and the UK government‚Äôs HM Treasury closely monitor these impacts. What is the Forex market? The Forex market is a global decentralized or over-the-counter (OTC) market for the trading of currencies. This market determines foreign exchange rates for every currency. It includes all aspects of buying, selling, and exchanging currencies at current or determined prices. Major players include central banks like the Federal Reserve and the European Central Bank , commercial banks, investment firms, and individual traders. How does a strong US Dollar affect other economies? A strong US Dollar can make goods and services from other countries cheaper for US consumers, but it also makes US exports more expensive. For countries that have dollar-denominated debt, a stronger dollar increases the cost of servicing and repaying that debt. This can lead to financial strain in emerging markets and influence global trade balances. Can the British Sterling recover its strength? The recovery of the British Sterling depends heavily on an improvement in the UK‚Äôs economic outlook and greater political stability. Addressing high inflation, fostering economic growth, and providing clear, consistent policy direction would be crucial. The International Monetary Fund (IMF) often provides recommendations for such economic adjustments. Conclusion: Navigating the Evolving Currency Landscape The current divergence between the resilient US Dollar and the struggling British Sterling offers a compelling case study in the complex interplay of economic fundamentals, central bank policies, and political stability. The dollar‚Äôs strength reflects its safe-haven status and the Federal Reserve‚Äôs firm monetary policy, while the Sterling‚Äôs weakness highlights the profound impact of domestic political woes and economic challenges. Understanding these dynamics is not just for currency traders; it‚Äôs essential for anyone seeking to comprehend the broader shifts in global economics and their potential ripple effects on various financial markets, including the burgeoning cryptocurrency space. As these currencies continue their respective journeys, staying informed and adaptable remains the key to navigating an ever-evolving financial world. To learn more about the latest Forex market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping the US Dollar, British Sterling, and global interest rates. This post US Dollar‚Äôs Resilient Reign: Navigating Global Currency Turbulence first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Crypto market crash wipes out $270 billion in 24 hours
body: The cryptocurrency market has experienced a significant downturn, with over $270 billion in market value evaporating within a 24-hour period. As of press time, the total market capitalization of cryptocurrencies stood at $3.45 trillion, down from $3.72 trillion just a day prior, according to CoinMarketCap data. 30-day global crypto market capitalization. Source: CoinMarketCap Leading the charge in this crash were some of the market‚Äôs top cryptocurrencies. Bitcoin ( BTC ), Ethereum ( ETH ), and XRP all saw substantial drops. Bitcoin, for instance, is trading around $103,944. Ethereum‚Äôs price has also slumped, now hovering around $3,500, while XRP, despite the recent excitement surrounding Ripple‚Äôs Swell conference, fell by 5.46%, trading at $2.27. Top cryptocurrencies. Source: Finbold Why crypto market is crashing The catalyst for this sharp sell-off appears to be comments by United States Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell. At last week‚Äôs meeting, Powell stated that a rate cut in December was not guaranteed, signaling a slower pace of interest-rate reductions and caution regarding inflation. These remarks immediately impacted global risk sentiment, leading to a sell-off in both equities and cryptocurrencies. At the same time, the rising strength of the US dollar, particularly against the Japanese yen, has further amplified the aversion to risk assets, pushing traders to shift toward safer investments. Additionally, volatility in the cryptocurrency market has been exacerbated by derivatives activity. With perpetual contract volumes soaring by 142% and open interest falling by 5.1%, there have been signs of a classic long squeeze. Pressure on leveraged positions This has placed pressure on leveraged positions, with major altcoins like Solana ( SOL ) and XRP experiencing 8% to 9% drops. In Solana‚Äôs case, the price fell below its 200-day exponential moving average (EMA), triggering liquidation events to the tune of $19 million. The market has also been plagued by what analysts are calling ‚Äúnarrative fatigue.‚Äù Despite ongoing institutional interest, particularly BlackRock‚Äôs push for tokenization, the technical damage to altcoins has been significant and difficult to overcome. As the sell-off continues, traders are keeping a close eye on upcoming macroeconomic data, including the U.S. jobs report on November 7, which could further impact market dynamics. Featured image via Shutterstock The post Crypto market crash wipes out $270 billion in 24 hours appeared first on Finbold .
